ThingDef.label: Crystal, Violet
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with an inner violet light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Blue
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with an inner blue light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Green
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with an inner green light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Yellow
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with an inner yellow light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Orange
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with an inner orange light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Red
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with an inner red light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Silver
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with an inner silver light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Viridian
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with a silvery green light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Cyan
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with an inner cyan light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Bronze
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. Yellowish-brown in color, the same sort of crystal is sometimes used in high resolution displays.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Fuchsia
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. It glows faintly with an inner fuchsia light.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Turquoise
ThingDef.description: A faceted crystal used in the constructing of a lightsaber. These rare turquoise gems are only found underneath the Hrakert Rift on Manaan, and are believed to be a kind of crystallized Kolto formed from immense aquatic pressure.

ThingDef.label: fractured Kyber crystal
ThingDef.description: This red-hued color crystal is fractured in several places. Most Kyber crystals have difficulty producing a blade with even the slightest imperfection, yet curiously, this one works. It radiates with a dark energy, and the blade which it produces is unstable and difficult to wield. It glows a much deeper shade of red than those commonly used by dark-siders.

ThingDef.label: Mantle of the Force
ThingDef.description: The Mantle of the Force is an item assembled by Suvam Tan from pieces found in the ruins of Exar Kun's temples on the fourth moon orbiting Yavin. It appears to be the remains of an even older artifact of unknown origin. It is not known if it was used by Exar Kun, or just uncovered when his temples were destroyed. Nor is it known what the original properties of the item were, but given the current abilities, in its original state it must have been fearsome indeed.\n\nThe Mantle is a crystalline lattice, resembling a lightsaber crystal in many ways, but having the additional property of being able to radically alter the flow of energy that passes through it. Additionally, the Mantle seems to almost act as a focusing tool for Force-sensitive individuals, leading to the idea that the original artifact may once have been a powerful tool of the Sith, or perhaps something they took with them when the dark Jedi originally split from the Order.

ThingDef.label: Heart of the Guardian
ThingDef.description: Though its origins have been lost, the legendary artifact known as the Heart of the Guardian was rumored to have been instrumental in the founding of the guardian order of Jedi. Nothing further is mentioned in any Jedi archive, but both Sith and Jedi whisper their own legends. According to the Jedi, the Heart will appear in a time of greatest turmoil and deliver the galaxy into salvation. The Sith, however, believe it to be an object of their heritage, which will bring the galaxy under their dominion.\n\nThe Heart of the Guardian appears to be a magnificently shaped lightsaber crystal of unknown composition. Analysis by Suvam Tan has yielded inconclusive results, not being able to identify what mineral it's made of. Suvam has even begun to wonder if it is a normal crystal at all, for at times it almost seems as if it were alive.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Adegan
ThingDef.description: Adegan crystals, also called Ilum crystals, are one of the most common lightsaber focusing crystals.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Rubat
ThingDef.description: Used in lightsaber construction, rubat crystal is mined on Phemis. It produces a clearly defined blade that a Jedi can easily focus on.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Ruusan
ThingDef.description: Ruusan crystals come from the Mid Rim planet of the same name. While not directly affecting a lightsaber's effectiveness, they aid a Jedi in focusing the Force.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Velmorite
ThingDef.description: Found only on the planet Velmor, these crystals produce a very fine beam that is easy to wield skillfully.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Sigil
ThingDef.description: Mined in the Sigil System, this crystal is a costly but valued addition to a lightsaber. It produces a fiercely bright beam that sears on contact, inflicting great damage.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Nextor
ThingDef.description: This crystal is mined in the mountains of planet M'haeli, and when used in lightsaber construction it produces a volatile blade that can cause surprising amounts of damage.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Eralam
ThingDef.description: Once mined on the third moon of Erai, ancient Sith bombardment shattered much that remained. If they can be found, these crystals produce a clear, superior lightsaber beam.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Kasha
ThingDef.description: This crystal is traditionally used by the Cereans as a meditation tool. When used as a lightsaber crystal, it helps clear the wielder's mind of distractions, even during tense combat.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Damind
ThingDef.description: Found on the desert world of Daminia, this crystal can be used in lightsaber construction to produce a clearly defined beam of subtly wider width and length.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Sapith
ThingDef.description: This crystallized material was excreted once every 11 years by the ancient Volice worm of Lwhekk, now extinct. It produces a more intense lightsaber beam, granting better control.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Opila
ThingDef.description: Found in the asteroid fields of the Fyrth system, this crystal can be used in lightsaber construction to produce an intense beam that seems extraordinarily quick to the cut.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Upari
ThingDef.description: Strangely, this crystal is usually encountered scattered in the orbit of primarily forest worlds. It is brittle but versatile, and a Master Jedi can get it to produce many effects.

ThingDef.label: Lorrdian Gemstone
ThingDef.description: During their subjugation, the Lorrdians were banned from speaking to each other and thus learned to use subtle gestures and ticks to communicate. The few Force-Adepts found after the Jedi freed the population of slaves has imprinted these gemstones with the Force to enhance the ability to read an opponent.

ThingDef.label: Ankarres Sapphire
ThingDef.description: This crystal possesses legendary healing powers and numerous other effects. It is one of the most potent crystals that can be used in lightsaber creation.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Kaiburr
ThingDef.description: Perhaps the most powerful crystal that can be used in a lightsaber, the Kaiburr gem bestows insight and fortitude upon its owner.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Dragite
ThingDef.description: Dragite crystals are found on M'haeli, in the D'olop mountain range. The beam they create resonates loudly when it strikes, inflicting a minor amount of sonic damage.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Jenurax
ThingDef.description: The refined form of Opila, this crystal has been cleansed of all impurities. When used in lightsaber construction it produces a blade of unerring quickness.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Luxum
ThingDef.description: Ambria was a world in the grip of the dark side. Through years of mental battle, strange Jedi Master Thon contained the evil to Lake Natth. Long meditation can form this powerful crystal from the tainted water.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Phond
ThingDef.description: The strange byproduct of rare impurities bonding during the making of certain alloys and some random external condition, this crystal produces a fiercely burning lightsaber beam.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Bondar
ThingDef.description: This crystal was mined on a far-orbit asteroid circling the Alderaan system. It produces a volatile lightsaber beam that pulses on impact, discharging part of its energy into an opponent.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Pontite
ThingDef.description: Pontite is one of the rarest forms of Adegan crystal. It radiates a powerful aura that cools both skin and tempers.

ThingDef.label: crystal, Firkann
ThingDef.description: This heavy crystal is collected by the natives of Rafa V. If used in lightsaber construction it produces an electrically charged beam that is much easier to manipulate than standard beams.

ThingDef.label: Ultima Pearl
ThingDef.description: An unusual choice for a lightsaber focusing crystal, this rare stone can be found on Calamari. Difficult to properly install in a lightsaber, this valuable stone has powerful effects.

ThingDef.label: Barab Ore Ingot
ThingDef.description: The ore from Barab I actually lies on the planet's surface, meaning it is exposed to high doses of radiation and torrential downpours daily. This ore can be found in concentrated ingots that actual store and magnify the radiation. When placed in a lightsaber, the ingots produce a blade that burns almost to the point of losing its cohesion.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Hurrikaine
ThingDef.description: The very rare Hurrikaine crystal is best known for its unparalleled beauty. When used in a lightsaber, the dark gemstone creates a devastating beam that can partially penetrate any defenses.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Artusian
ThingDef.description: Found only on an obscure colony world near Telos, these rare crystals have an almost Kyber-like connection to the Force. When installed in a lightsaber, these crystals bolster one's sensitivity to the Force to an unrivaled degree, turning those with even the most tenuous connection into a capable adept.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Qixoni
ThingDef.description: Qixoni crystals were formed on a planet that was destroyed millenia ago when its star went supernova. They are exceedingly rare and also quite powerful.

ThingDef.label: Crystal, Solari
ThingDef.description: There are many famous lightsaber crystals spoken of in the history of the Jedi Order, though few are as powerful as the legendary Solari Crystal.\n\nWhen the great Jedi Master Ood Bnar initiated his life-cycle change after a thousand years of serving the Order, he bequeathed the Solari Crystal to his most promising student, a young female Jedi named Shaela Nuur. When Shaela disappeared shortly after the time of the Great Hunt, the Solari Crystal vanished with her.
